mapper.select: SELECT NO, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, VIEWS FROM POSTS ORDER BY NO DESC
SELECT NO, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, VIEWS FROM POSTS WHERE NO = #{no}

choose.when: INSERT INTO POSTS (TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, VIEWS) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, COALESCE(#{createdAt}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), #{updatedAt}, COALESCE(#{views}, 0) )
choose.otherwise: MERGE INTO POSTS (NO, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, VIEWS) KEY (NO) VALUES ( #{no}, #{title}, #{content}, COALESCE(#{createdAt}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), #{updatedAt}, COALESCE(#{views}, 0) )
